sentence.Network_en: Such laws could protect the consumer from harmful or dangerous remedies.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样的法规可以保护消费者免受有害或者危险药品的威胁。

sentence.Network_en: Dangerous undertows make swimming unsafe along most of the coastline.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于存在着危险的下层逆流，在大部分海岸线附近游泳都不安全。

sentence.Network_en: He described the situation as very dangerous and called for resolute action.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将形势描述得非常危险，并号召采取果断行动。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the senses 'arrogant', 'fastidious', and 'difficult to please'): from Old French dangereus, from dangier (see danger)

entry.tran: 危险的;可能带来危害的;不安全的
entry.def: If something is dangerous, it is able or likely to hurt or harm you.

example.ex: It's a dangerous stretch of road.

means.word_mean: 1. involving or causing danger or risk; liable to hurt or harm;
2. causing fear or anxiety by threatening great harm;

auth_sentence.content: So there will be no need for dangerous power!
auth_sentence.res_content: So there will be no need for dangerous power!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So there will be no need for dangerous power!

auth_sentence.content: I got from the article that sandstorms are dangerous.
auth_sentence.res_content: I got from the article that sandstorms are dangerous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I got from the article that sandstorms are dangerous.

auth_sentence.content: Is it dangerous to put carnitine in energy drinks?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is it dangerous to put carnitine in energy drinks?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is it dangerous to put carnitine in energy drinks?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表示"……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 严格的,严厉的,严酷的,严密的,严谨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rigor严格,严厉,苛刻,严密+ous……的→adj.严格的,严厉的,严酷的,严密的,严谨的
advantage优势,有利条件,利益+ous……的→adj.有利的,有助的
courage勇气,精神+ous……的→adj.勇敢的,无畏的
danger危险,危险物,威胁+ous……的→adj.危险的,不安全的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有毒的,恶意的,恶毒的,道德败坏的
stems_affixes.word_buile: poison毒药+ous……的→adj.有毒的,恶意的,恶毒的,道德败坏的

Sentence.sentence: The supervisor of the laboratory is beginning to get headaches and dizzy spells because she says it's dangerous to breathe some of the chemical smoke there.
I can't seem to get anyone in the hospital to listen to my complaints and this outdated equipment is dangerous.
Mountain climbing is becoming popular sport, but it is also a potentially dangerous one
The conclusion was that social isolation is statistically as dangerous as high blood pressure, smoking and obesity.

sentences.en: We argued him out of going on such a dangerous journey.
sentences.cn: 我们劝说他别去做如此危险的旅行。

sentences.en: Except for the gun, he did not look very dangerous.
sentences.cn: 除了那支枪以外, 他看上去并不像危险人物。

sentences.en: Being lost in the bush is very dangerous.
sentences.cn: 在丛林中迷了路是很危险的。

sentences.en: The fire is dangerous to us as it is so near.
sentences.cn: 火这么近, 对我们很危险。

sentences.en: The man is dangerous to his community.
sentences.cn: 这个人对他的社区是危险的。

sentences.en: This sort of punishment is applied only to nonviolent criminals who are not likely to be dangerous to the public.
sentences.cn: 这种惩罚手段只适用于那些对公众不太可能形成危险的非施暴罪犯。

sentences.en: The river is dangerous to bathe in.
sentences.cn: 在那条河里游泳是危险的。

sentences.en: The bridge is dangerous to cross.
It is dangerous to play with fire.
It is dangerous to walk on the thin ice.
sentences.cn: 在薄冰上行走是危险的。

sentences.en: It's dangerous to go too near the edge of the cliff.
sentences.cn: 靠近悬崖的边缘行走是很不安全的。

sentences.en: It is dangerous for a girl to go out alone at night.
sentences.cn: 一个女孩夜里单独外出是危险的。

sentences.en: It is dangerous for you to do the work.
sentences.cn: 你做这种工作是危险的。

sentences.en: “Well, what more dangerous do you want?”He argues.
“你还要干出什么更危险的事来?
Charles Bright thought it dangerous to lay the cable in these conditions;  and so he shouted to the men to stop the machine.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯·布赖特认为在这样的条件下铺设电缆很危险, 所以他叫人们把机器停下来。

jushi.english: He is a dangerous person; keep away from him.
jushi.chinese: 他是一个危险分子,离他远点。

jushi.english: We argued him out of going on such a dangerous journey.
jushi.chinese: 我们劝说他别去做如此危险的旅行。
